proposal1.heroHeadline: KBD is losing 300 hours a year on manual proposal writing. Here is exactly how.
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Currently, crafting proposals for your marketing services takes hours. With our AI, it's done in 47 seconds.
proposal1.problemsIntro: Below are ongoing losses that KBD faces with its current proposal process.

problems.title: Time Draining
problems.description: Each proposal takes about 3 hours to draft. That's 300 hours a year not spent on client acquisition.

problems.title: Missed Opportunities
problems.description: Every day spent on proposals is a day not spent pitching new clients. This costs KBD potential contracts.

problems.title: Inconsistent Branding
problems.description: Manually crafted proposals can lack brand consistency. This inconsistency can dilute KBD's market presence.

problems.title: High Labor Costs
problems.description: With two staff members, the labor cost of proposal writing is significant. This drains resources that could grow the business.

problems.title: Delayed Responses
problems.description: Slow proposal turnaround leads to delayed client responses. This can result in lost deals as prospects move on.

problems.title: Stress and Burnout
problems.description: Constant pressure to generate proposals impacts employee well-being. This results in decreased productivity over time.

proposal1.solutionIntro: Our AI system replaces all these losses with efficient, branded proposal generation.

solutions.title: Instant Proposal Generation
solutions.description: Currently, proposals take hours. Our system completes them in under 60 seconds.

solutions.title: Consistent Branding
solutions.description: Manual processes lead to inconsistency. Our AI ensures every proposal matches KBD's brand perfectly.

solutions.title: Resource Optimization
solutions.description: High labor costs drain resources. Our system frees up time and reduces costs, allowing focus on growth.

solutions.title: Rapid Client Response
solutions.description: Delayed proposals slow client interactions. Our AI enables rapid responses, keeping KBD ahead of competitors.

solutions.title: Enhanced Productivity
solutions.description: Stress impacts productivity. Our system reduces workload, improving employee well-being and output.

proposal1.whyUsIntro: Four reasons this works. Not marketing claims. Engineering facts.

whyUsCards.title: Speed
whyUsCards.description: Every hour your team spends writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This system gives those hours back. Lead data in, live proposal out, 60 seconds.

whyUsCards.title: Personalization
whyUsCards.description: Generic proposals get ignored. Personalized proposals close. The system reads each prospect's website and reflects their services, tone, and positioning back to them. Written from scratch, not templated.

whyUsCards.title: Ownership
whyUsCards.description: No monthly subscription bleeding your budget. No vendor deciding to raise prices or shut down. You own the source code, the infrastructure, and the data. Permanently.

whyUsCards.title: Support
whyUsCards.description: Personal onboarding, a video walkthrough your team can reference anytime, and one week of post-delivery support. You are not left figuring this out alone.

fearCards.title: You are probably thinking: our stack is complicated.
fearCards.sub: CRM, email, Sheets, Slack. The system connects to whatever you already use. No migration.

fearCards.title: You might be wondering if this breaks your current workflow.
fearCards.sub: It runs alongside everything you have. Nothing changes except the time you spend on proposals.

fearCards.title: You are concerned the output will not match your standards.
fearCards.sub: Revisions are part of the build. We configure, test, and refine until the output matches your bar exactly.

proposal1.teamIntro: Your point of contact. No handoffs, no account managers, no layers.

team.name: Ayush Chauhan
team.bio: Full-stack engineer specializing in AI automation for agencies and service businesses. Every engagement personally handled from architecture through deployment. 15+ systems built. Zero failed deliveries. Works async, ships fast.

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Kickoff (Async or Call)
process.description: We map your workflow, services, and current proposal process. Can be a 15-minute call or handled entirely over email. By the end, we have everything needed to configure the system.

process.title: System Configuration
process.description: The engine gets configured with your services, pricing structure, tone of voice, and brand standards. Every proposal it generates will sound like your best strategist wrote it.

process.title: Build and QA
process.description: Test proposals generated and reviewed against your quality bar. Refinements continue until the output is indistinguishable from what your team produces manually.

process.title: Deployment and Handoff
process.description: Deployed to production with full infrastructure. You receive a video walkthrough, documentation, and complete source code. From this point, the system runs without us.

proposal1.pricingIntro: Two options. Both are one-time builds. No subscriptions, no recurring fees. You own the source code and infrastructure permanently.

pricing.name: Proposal Engine
pricing.subtitle: // Core System
pricing.description: Custom proposal automation configured for KBD's services, voice, and pricing structure.

pricing.name: Engine + AI Chatbot
pricing.subtitle: // Recommended
pricing.description: Everything above, plus an AI sales assistant embedded in every proposal. Handles objections, answers questions, and books calls for KBD around the clock.
features: AI chatbot on every proposal page

proposal1.ctaHeadline: See this running on your actual proposals.
proposal1.ctaDescription: Reply here or email Ayush directly. He will send the onboarding form. Takes about 10 minutes and the build starts the same day. Custom-configured for KBD.

proposal2.heroHeadline: Transform Acme Corp's Online Presence with KBD's Expertise
proposal2.heroSubheadline: Our strategic approach will enhance Acme Corp's brand visibility and increase conversion rates through tailored marketing solutions.
proposal2.problemsIntro: Acme Corp is currently losing potential revenue due to inefficiencies in its marketing strategy.

problems.title: Low Conversion Rates
problems.description: Every visitor who leaves without purchasing is a missed sales opportunity. This results in an estimated 20% revenue loss monthly.

problems.title: Poor Brand Visibility
problems.description: Limited online presence means Acme Corp is missing out on a significant share of the market. This leads to an estimated 15% potential customer loss.

problems.title: Ineffective Advertising
problems.description: Current ad strategies result in high costs per acquisition, wasting approximately $10,000 monthly in inefficient spend.

problems.title: Weak Social Engagement
problems.description: Low interaction on social platforms leads to reduced brand loyalty, costing an estimated 10% in repeat business.

problems.title: Outdated Website Design
problems.description: A non-responsive website discourages mobile users, resulting in a 25% bounce rate increase.

problems.title: Lack of Data Insights
problems.description: Without actionable insights, Acme Corp is unable to optimize campaigns, causing a 12% shortfall in marketing ROI.

proposal2.solutionIntro: KBD's solutions address these losses by leveraging our expertise in strategic marketing and data-driven insights.

solutions.title: SEO Optimization
solutions.description: Enhances search engine visibility, driving more organic traffic to your site.

solutions.title: PPC Management
solutions.description: Targets the right audience with optimized ad spend to improve conversion rates.

solutions.title: Social Media Strategy
solutions.description: Engages your audience effectively to build brand loyalty and increase social reach.

solutions.title: Web Design & Development
solutions.description: Creates a user-friendly website to decrease bounce rates and enhance user experience.

proposal2.whyUsIntro: KBD is dedicated to delivering measurable results through strategic marketing expertise.

whyUsCards.title: Proven Results
whyUsCards.description: We have a track record of increasing client revenue through targeted strategies.

whyUsCards.title: Data-Driven Insights
whyUsCards.description: Our approach is grounded in analytics to ensure every decision is impactful.

whyUsCards.title: Collaborative Approach
whyUsCards.description: We work closely with you to understand your unique business needs.

whyUsCards.title: Innovative Solutions
whyUsCards.description: Our creative team is always ahead of the curve, providing innovative marketing strategies.

proposal2.teamIntro: Our team is led by experienced professionals dedicated to your success.

team.name: Kevin Brown
team.bio: Kevin leads strategy and client relationships, ensuring each project aligns with client goals. His expertise in marketing drives successful outcomes.

proposal2.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Discovery & Strategy
process.description: We identify key opportunities and define project goals.

process.title: Implementation
process.description: Our team executes the strategy across chosen platforms.

process.title: Monitoring & Adjustments
process.description: We track performance and make necessary adjustments.

process.title: Review & Reporting
process.description: We review outcomes and plan for future growth.
